verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> Thou <WH859> and thy sons <WH1121> and thy father's <WH1> house <WH1004> with <WH854> thee shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> the iniquity <WH5771> of the sanctuary: <WH4720> and thou <WH859> and thy sons <WH1121> with <WH854> thee shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> the iniquity <WH5771> of your priesthood. <WH3550>

And <WH853> thy brethren <WH251> also <WH1571> of the tribe <WH4294> of Levi, <WH3878> the tribe <WH7626> of thy father, <WH1> bring <WH7126> thou with <WH854> thee, that they may be joined <WH3867> unto <WH5921> thee, and minister <WH8334> unto thee: but thou <WH859> and thy sons <WH1121> with <WH854> thee shall minister before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of witness. <WH5715>

And they shall keep <WH8104> thy charge, <WH4931> and the charge <WH4931> of all <WH3605> the tabernacle: <WH168> only <WH389> they shall not <WH3808> come nigh <WH7126> <WH413> the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944> and the altar, <WH4196> that neither <WH3808> <WH1571> they, <WH1992> nor ye <WH859> also, <WH1571> die. <WH4191>

And they shall be joined <WH3867> unto <WH5921> thee, and keep <WH8104> <WH853> the charge <WH4931> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> for all <WH3605> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle: <WH168> and a stranger <WH2114> shall not <WH3808> come nigh <WH7126> unto <WH413> you.

And ye shall keep <WH8104> <WH853> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> and the charge <WH4931> of the altar: <WH4196> that there be <WH1961> no <WH3808> wrath <WH7110> any more <WH5750> upon <WH5921> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And I, <WH589> behold, <WH2009> I have taken <WH3947> <WH853> your brethren <WH251> the Levites <WH3881> from among <WH4480> <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> to you they are given <WH5414> as a gift <WH4979> for the LORD, <WH3068> to do <WH5647> <WH853> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

Therefore thou <WH859> and thy sons <WH1121> with <WH854> thee shall keep <WH8104> <WH853> your priest's office <WH3550> for every <WH3605> thing <WH1697> of the altar, <WH4196> and within <WH4480> <WH1004> the veil; <WH6532> and ye shall serve: <WH5647> I have given <WH5414> <WH853> your priest's office <WH3550> unto you as a service <WH5656> of gift: <WH4979> and the stranger <WH2114> that cometh nigh <WH7131> shall be put to death. <WH4191>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> Behold, <WH2009> I <WH589> also have given <WH5414> thee <WH853> the charge <WH4931> of mine heave offerings <WH8641> of all <WH3605> the hallowed things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> unto thee have I given <WH5414> them by reason of the anointing, <WH4888> and to thy sons, <WH1121> by an ordinance <WH2706> forever. <WH5769>

This <WH2088> shall be <WH1961> thine of the most holy things, <WH4480> <WH6944> <WH6944> reserved from <WH4480> the fire: <WH784> every <WH3605> oblation <WH7133> of theirs, every <WH3605> meat offering <WH4503> of theirs, and every <WH3605> sin offering <WH2403> of theirs, and every <WH3605> trespass offering <WH817> of theirs, which <WH834> they shall render <WH7725> unto me, shall be most holy <WH6944> <WH6944> for thee and for thy sons. <WH1121>
In the most holy <WH6944> <WH6944> place shalt thou eat <WH398> it; every <WH3605> male <WH2145> shall eat <WH398> it: it shall be <WH1961> holy <WH6944> unto thee.

And this <WH2088> is thine; the heave offering <WH8641> of their gift, <WH4976> with all <WH3605> the wave offerings <WH8573> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> I have given <WH5414> them unto thee, and to thy sons <WH1121> and to thy daughters <WH1323> with <WH854> thee, by a statute <WH2706> forever: <WH5769> every one <WH3605> that is clean <WH2889> in thy house <WH1004> shall eat <WH398> of it.

All <WH3605> the best <WH2459> of the oil, <WH3323> and all <WH3605> the best <WH2459> of the wine, <WH8492> and of the wheat, <WH1715> the firstfruits <WH7225> of them which <WH834> they shall offer <WH5414> unto the LORD, <WH3068> them have I given <WH5414> thee.

And whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> is first ripe <WH1061> in the land, <WH776> which <WH834> they shall bring <WH935> unto the LORD, <WH3068> shall be <WH1961> thine; every one <WH3605> that is clean <WH2889> in thine house <WH1004> shall eat <WH398> of it.
Every thing <WH3605> devoted <WH2764> in Israel <WH3478> shall be <WH1961> thine.

Every thing <WH3605> that openeth <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358> in all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> which <WH834> they bring <WH7126> unto the LORD, <WH3068> whether it be of men <WH120> or beasts, <WH929> shall be <WH1961> thine: nevertheless <WH389> <WH853> the firstborn <WH1060> of man <WH120> shalt thou surely redeem, <WH6299> <WH6299> and the firstling <WH1060> of unclean <WH2931> beasts <WH929> shalt thou redeem. <WH6299>

And those that are to be redeemed <WH6299> from a month <WH2320> old <WH4480> <WH1121> shalt thou redeem, <WH6299> according to thine estimation, <WH6187> for the money <WH3701> of five <WH2568> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> which <WH1931> is twenty <WH6242> gerahs. <WH1626>

But <WH389> the firstling <WH1060> of a cow, <WH7794> or <WH176> the firstling <WH1060> of a sheep, <WH3775> or <WH176> the firstling <WH1060> of a goat, <WH5795> thou shalt not <WH3808> redeem; <WH6299> they <WH1992> are holy: <WH6944> thou shalt sprinkle <WH2236> <WH853> their blood <WH1818> upon <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and shalt burn <WH6999> their fat <WH2459> for an offering made by fire, <WH801> for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
And the flesh <WH1320> of them shall be <WH1961> thine, as the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and as the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> are <WH1961> thine.

All <WH3605> the heave offerings <WH8641> of the holy things, <WH6944> which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> offer <WH7311> unto the LORD, <WH3068> have I given <WH5414> thee, and thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> with <WH854> thee, by a statute <WH2706> forever: <WH5769> it <WH1931> is a covenant <WH1285> of salt <WH4417> forever <WH5769> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> unto thee and to thy seed <WH2233> with <WH854> thee.

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> Thou shalt have no inheritance <WH5157> <WH3808> in their land, <WH776> neither <WH3808> shalt thou have <WH1961> any part <WH2506> among <WH8432> them: I <WH589> am thy part <WH2506> and thine inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And, behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> all <WH3605> the tenth <WH4643> in Israel <WH3478> for an inheritance, <WH5159> for <WH2500> their service <WH5656> which <WH834> they <WH1992> serve, <WH5647> even <WH853> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

Neither <WH3808> must the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> henceforth <WH5750> come nigh <WH7126> <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> lest they bear <WH5375> sin, <WH2399> and die. <WH4191>

But the Levites <WH3881> shall do <WH5647> <WH853> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and they <WH1992> shall bear <WH5375> their iniquity: <WH5771> it shall be a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> throughout your generations, <WH1755> that among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> they have <WH5157> no <WH3808> inheritance. <WH5159>

But <WH3588> <WH853> the tithes <WH4643> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> they offer <WH7311> as a heave offering <WH8641> unto the LORD, <WH3068> I have given <WH5414> to the Levites <WH3881> to inherit: <WH5159> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> I have said <WH559> unto them, Among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> they shall have <WH5157> no <WH3808> inheritance. <WH5159>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Thus speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the Levites, <WH3881> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, When <WH3588> ye take <WH3947> of <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> <WH853> the tithes <WH4643> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> you from <WH4480> <WH854> them for your inheritance, <WH5159> then ye shall offer up <WH7311> a heave offering <WH8641> of <WH4480> it for the LORD, <WH3068> even a tenth <WH4643> part of <WH4480> the tithe. <WH4643>

And this your heave offering <WH8641> shall be reckoned <WH2803> unto you, as though it were the corn <WH1715> of <WH4480> the threshingfloor, <WH1637> and as the fullness <WH4395> of <WH4480> the winepress. <WH3342>

Thus <WH3651> ye <WH859> also <WH1571> shall offer <WH7311> a heave offering <WH8641> unto the LORD <WH3068> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> your tithes, <WH4643> which <WH834> ye receive <WH3947> of <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> and ye shall give <WH5414> thereof <WH4480> <WH853> the LORD's <WH3068> heave offering <WH8641> to Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>

Out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> your gifts <WH4979> ye shall offer <WH7311> <WH853> every <WH3605> heave offering <WH8641> of the LORD, <WH3068> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> the best <WH2459> thereof, even <WH853> the hallowed part <WH4720> thereof out of <WH4480> it.

Therefore thou shalt say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, When ye have heaved <WH7311> <WH853> the best <WH2459> thereof from <WH4480> it, then it shall be counted <WH2803> unto the Levites <WH3881> as the increase <WH8393> of the threshingfloor, <WH1637> and as the increase <WH8393> of the winepress. <WH3342>

And ye shall eat <WH398> it in every <WH3605> place, <WH4725> ye <WH859> and your households: <WH1004> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is your reward <WH7939> for <WH2500> your service <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And ye shall bear <WH5375> no <WH3808> sin <WH2399> by reason of <WH5921> it, when ye have heaved <WH7311> from it <WH853> the best <WH2459> of <WH4480> it: neither <WH3808> shall ye pollute <WH2490> the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> lest <WH3808> ye die. <WH4191>
